# slicer_secret (Data Source)

Fetches metadata about a Slicer secret. Note: The actual secret value is not returned for security reasons.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "slicer_secret" "example" {
  name = "example-secret"
}

output "secret_size" {
  value = data.slicer_secret.example.size
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) The name of the secret to look up.

### Read-Only

- `gid` (Number) Group GID of the secret file.
- `permissions` (String) File permissions of the secret.
- `size` (Number) The size of the secret data in bytes.
- `uid` (Number) Owner UID of the secret file.
